kw.name: Start Application
kw.doc: Alias for `Launch Application` keyword

kw.name: Select Window
kw.doc: Selects a window as current context and sets focus to it.

kw.name: Catenate
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.

kw.name: Click On Component
kw.doc: Clicks on a component.

kw.name: Catenate
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.

kw.name: Get Button Text
kw.doc: Uses current context to search for a button and when found, returns the text it is labeled with.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Catenate
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.
